channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Office 365 ProPlus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Office 365 ProPlus

item.title: CVE-2020-0653|2024-08-04T06:11:04.899Z -- microsoft -- office%20365%20proplus
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Excel software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0650, CVE-2020-0651.

item.title: CVE-2020-0697|2024-08-04T06:11:05.602Z -- microsoft -- office%20365%20proplus
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office OLicenseHeartbeat task, where an attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run this task as SYSTEM.To exploit the vulnerability, an authenticated attacker would need to place a specially crafted file in a specific location, thereby allowing arbitrary file corruption.The security update addresses the vulnerability by correcting how the process validates the log file., aka 'Microsoft Office Tampering Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-0979|2024-08-04T06:18:03.681Z -- microsoft -- office%20365%20proplus
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Excel software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0906.
